snippet.title: Right and Down and Dice - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2228010/Right_and_Down_and_Dice/?utm_source=youtube_mc2games

Explore randomly generated card dungeons where you can only move Right and Down, use Dice to defeat mighty enemies, gather powerful artifacts and learn new abilites! Will you be able to escape from the dungeon?
